long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Refundo Chrome Extension allows you to paste in a easy way all information from Refundo Dashboard without having to deal deal with copy and paste manually.
For using this extension successfully you have to be enrolled in Refundo Dashboard platform as an unauthorized ERO. Also you need to have a valid subscription on drake software in order to paste your tax payers informations. Don't worry about information security, in the extension we don't retain any information and it's not used with other intention but helping you to improve your experience moving information from Refundo Dashboard to Drake Cloud. Also because information could be managed with this is critical, we use standard encryption SHA256 in order to keep you information secure.
For start using effectively this Extension you need to provide your office code provided on Refundo's platform and that's it, everything you copy from Refundo Dashboard will pasted by the extension to Drake's platform.
